import React from "react"; function SignupForm() { loadImage = (event) => { let image = document.getElementById("output"); let icon = document.getElementById("userIcon"); this.setState({ profilePic: event.target.files[0], }); image.src = URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]); icon.parentNode.removeChild(icon); }; handleChecked = (event) => { let updatedCheckbox = Object.assign({}, this.state.vaardigheid, { [event.target.name]: event.target.checked, }); this.setState({ vaardigheid: updatedCheckbox, }); }; handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); }; return (
